间充质干细胞疗法治疗重症 COVID-19 的安全性常氧同种异体脐带间充质干细胞对于治疗重症 COVID-19 患者是安全有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-safety-of-mesenchymal-stem-cell-therapy-for-treating-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-safety-of-mesenchymal-stem-cell-therapy-for-treating-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5249eb2-9248-4d81-89d8-47f928fb1aa5 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:15:00 -0400 The safety of mesenchymal stem cell therapy for treating severe COVID-19
死后人类大脑和活人大脑之间基因表达的相似性研究人员比较了活体和死后样本之间的人类前额皮质基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Similarities-in-gene-express- Between-post-mortem-and-living- human-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Similarities-in-gene-expression- Between-post-mortem-and-living- human-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5257201f-f92d-4ddb-b148-a6006383cc61 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 03:23:00 -0400 Similarities in gene expression between post-mortem and living human brains
循环蛋白质组如何影响大脑健康？研究人员调查了循环蛋白质组与大脑健康之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-does-the-circulate-proteome-influence-brain-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-does-the-circulate-proteome-influence-brain-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c26deb5-926e-40e5-bb05-b6d41e57bc11 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 03:18:00 -0400 How does the circulating proteome influence brain health?
研究发现三分之一的英国人羞于谈论消化系统健康症状新研究表明，三分之一的英国人 (33%) 不好意思谈论他们的消化系统健康症状，近三分之二 (64%) 的人希望获得更多支持来帮助了解他们的肠道健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/1-in-3-Brits-embarrassed-to-talk-about-digestive-health-symptoms-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/1-in-3-Brits-embarrassed-to-talk-about-digestive-health-symptoms-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cae5ce0-553a-4951-88bf-8c97e8b23606 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:50:00 -0400 1 in 3 Brits embarrassed to talk about digestive health symptoms, study finds
新冠病例和入院人数激增，主要检测专家警告称病例会卷土重来一位领先的检测专家担心，随着病例和入院人数激增，英国正面临新冠疫情卷土重来的情况。他说政府必须恢复三月份取消的抗体检测计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Covid-cases-and-hospital-admissions-soar-leading-testing-expert-warns-of-resurgence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Covid-cases-and-hospital-admissions-soar-leading-testing-expert-warns-of-resurgence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e4957a-cfa7-4c62-b9ac-fd3ba502545d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:40:00 -0400 Covid cases and hospital admissions soar, leading testing expert warns of resurgence
内耳 3D 分析有助于深入了解梅尼埃病现在，首次对内耳进行精细的 3D 分析，深入了解梅尼埃病患者特殊结构的体积变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/3D-analysis-of-inner-ear-provides-insights-into-Menieres-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/3D-analysis-of-inner-ear-provides-insights-into-Menieres-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d74964a1-5ce4-49b5-935b-41ba0483d9ae Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:36:00 -0400 3D analysis of inner ear provides insights into Ménière's disease
Numan 研究发现男性对睾酮缺乏的认知存在重大差距男性保健公司 Numan 的最新研究发现，与 TD 相关的知识存在重大差距，近一半 (44%) 的男性不清楚它是什么，并且对该病症的许多关键症状认识不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Numan-research-discovers-a-major-knowledge-gap-among-men-about-testosterone-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Numan-research-discovers-a-major-knowledge-gap-among-men-about-testosterone-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a438aaa5-4e78-4968-8486-29f836b1b95c Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:33:00 -0400 Numan research discovers a major knowledge gap among men about testosterone deficiency
伦敦 Bridge Clinic 呼吁提高生育治疗的财务透明度ESHRE 关于生育治疗附加项目的最新报告显示，诊所正在将其成功率未经证实的治疗纳入其护理计划，Bridge Clinic London 呼吁提高财务透明度，以保护患者的最大利益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Bridge-Clinic-London-calls-for-greater-financial-transparency-in-fertility-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Bridge-Clinic-London-calls-for-greater-financial-transparency-in-fertility-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3bb41f3-9953-43d2-bbdb-8b2f27a9a8ad Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:31:00 -0400 Bridge Clinic London calls for greater financial transparency in fertility treatments
研究有助于了解 RNA 修饰如何促进胰腺癌RNA 分子（例如 m6A）的化学修饰可以严重影响基因表达，从而影响癌症发生和进展的各个方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230806/Study-helps-understand-how-RNA-modification-promotes-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230806/Study-helps-understand-how-RNA-modification-promotes-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb8d050b-4a18-4a8e-b2b5-c52c9c83a7e6 Sun, 06 Aug 2023 11:16:44 -0400 Study helps understand how RNA modification promotes pancreatic cancer
头颈腺样囊性癌：治疗策略回顾2023年6月28日，《Oncoscience》（第10卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“头颈腺样囊性癌——具有可变定位的高度恶性肿瘤的治疗策略”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230806/Adenoid-cystic-carcinoma-of-the-head-and-neck-A-review-of-treatment-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230806/Adenoid-cystic-carcinoma-of-the-head-and-neck-A-review-of-treatment-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1437415e-d757-46f5-b10a-aaf65258e2c8 Sun, 06 Aug 2023 11:06:37 -0400 Adenoid cystic carcinoma of the head and neck: A review of treatment strategies
